data.name: Escape the Huntsman
data.detailed_description:
Escape the Huntsman is a point-and-click adventure game.

HELP ELESA FIND HER FREEDOM!
Starting on a much-anticipated journey to hunt the Braken Forest with her Uncle Seth, Elesa finds herself betrayed by her uncle and sold for marriage to a local huntsman. Isolated and trapped in his cabin and restricted to short outings to the local village, Elesa must use her wits to escape the Huntsman’s control before her much-dreaded wedding date. Along the way discover secrets about Elesa’s heritage and unravel the mystery about her mother’s people.

Features

This is a point and click adventure. You will use your mouse to interact with people and items. This game has a few puzzles, but is not puzzle-centric.

  • Search for clues;
  • Talk to game characters;
  • Collect and Interact with items;
  • Uncover secrets;
  • Solve a few puzzles.

Game Development Status

Note: This game is in the conceptual stage of development. Game-play, art, and interface details are under development. Stay tuned.

data.short_description: Use your wits to help Elesa escape her confinement. Unravel the truth behind the Huntsman's behavior. Immerse yourself in this point and click adventure where choices matter.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) , Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
